LanguageData.SrHediffAddictionTouchCat.label: Cat addiction
LanguageData.SrHediffAddictionTouchCat.description: Long-term touching the cat has caused the character to become dependent on touching the cat.
LanguageData.SrHediffAddictionTouchRabbit.label: Rabbit addiction
LanguageData.SrHediffAddictionTouchRabbit.description: Long-term touching the rabbit has caused the character to become dependent on touching the rabbit.
